abstract: Juan Martin del Potro defeats Dustin Brown to advance to second round of BMW Open tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.

headline.main: Juan Martín del Potro Wins on Clay

snippet: Del Potro made a successful clay-court comeback after three years away when he beat Dustin Brown, 7-6 (2), 6-4, to advance to the second round of the BMW Open in Munich.
lead_paragraph: Del Potro made a successful clay-court comeback after three years away when he beat Dustin Brown, 7-6 (2), 6-4, to advance to the second round of the BMW Open in Munich.
